about_the_game:
Can you navigate the unforgiving streets, where every corner hides more than just the undead?
Play as one of four characters in this first-person survival horror RPG, each with their own campaigns that intertwine with the others in a conflict of interest, where your choices determine the fate of not only the other characters, but the city itself.

confront the ultimate challenge — zombies and other monstrosities that cannot be vanquished. Your choices are to hide, to run, or to find weapons that offer a glimmer of hope. Stealth and resourcefulness are your allies as you hide from, outrun, or outwit relentless undead horrors.


More than braindead Every monster has their own personality, learn how they interact with the world and use their quirks against them.


Your choices are your compass in this grim world. Every dialogue option counts, unveiling unique twists and unlocking multiple endings, but it's not only your dialogue choices, it's your actions that mold the world around you.


The environment is your friend and your biggest enemy. No door is permanently closed, special environment interactions allow you to choose if the risk is enough to lose your pursuers, but your advantage can be used against you. Try not to box yourself in with your own traps.


Each campaign, a unique story
In Deadly Secret you play as Darren, a man who happened to be locked in a retirement villa during the quarantine, driven by the love of his ailing mother, who embarks in a perilous journey, across a city overrun by the undead and other monstrosities, with a singular objective: Secure life-saving medicine for his mother and supplies for the other survivors at the villa. Will your choices help him save his mother, or will they drive him further deep into despair?

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains explicit scenes of violence, gore, sexual content, and harsh language. Most of these can be toggled off in the game's settings.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: AMD APU, Zen 2 4c/8t, 2.4-3.5GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 RDNA 2 CUs, 1.0-1.6GHz
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 28 GB available space

short_description: A survival horror first person RPG with branching storylines and rich lore, where your dialogue choices can come back to haunt you. Use your wits to survive, put your sneaking skills to the test, and when all else fails, it's up to you to decide if your resources are worth the fight or not.
